member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RECONSTRUCTED_PICTURE
member.summary: Represents the reconstructed picture generated from the input frame passed to the encode operation.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RECONSTRUCTED_PICTURE.pReconstructedPicture
member.summary: A representing the reconstructed picture generated from the input frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_RECONSTRUCTED_PICTURE.ReconstructedPictureSubresource
member.summary: A UINT64 specifying the subresource index for pReconstructedPicture.
